title: Russia is helping China build a new missile attack warning system
text:
Russian President Vladamir Putin has confirmed that the country is helping China to build a missile attack warning system.

Putin made the move after it was revealed the US were planning to deploy intermediate-range missiles in Asia.

Only Russia and the US have the system but neither Putin nor Russia's major weapons manufacturer, Vympel, have given any details about it or the terms of the agreement.

The director general of Vympel, Sergei Boyev, told Russia's state-run media that going into detail on the plans would breech confidentiality agreements.

Russian President Vladamir Putin has confirmed that the country is helping China to build a missile attack warning system

Russia's defense system detects attacks on state and military posts and provides data to Moscow's missile defense system and the country's space monitoring system with its satellites. Pictured is a US Navy defense missile

The Kremlin's decision may lead to deeper cooperation with China on creating an integrated missile defense system.

Russia's defense system detects attacks on state and military posts and provides data to Moscow's missile defense system and the country's space monitoring system with its satellites.

Foreign affairs analyst Vladimir Frolov told CBS that Russia is effectively creating a military alliance with China, therefore reducing the possibility of military clashes between the two countries.

It also poses them as a force to be reckoned with, should any other country decide to oppose them.

According to Fort Russ, during his talk at the Valdai International Discussion Club Putin said: 'Regarding attempts to restrict China: I think by definition it is impossible.

'And if anyone makes these attempts, anyone who does will understand that it is impossible. And during these attempts, of course, they will be harmed.'

Foreign affairs analyst Vladimir Frolov told CBS that Russia is effectively creating a military alliance with China, therefore reducing the possibility of military clashes between the two countries. Pictured are some of China's newest defense weapons

Only Russia and the US have the system but neither Putin nor Russia's major weapons manufacturer, Vympel, have given any details about it or the terms of the agreement. Pictured is Chinese President Xi Jinping

Frolov said: 'If the Chinese missile attack warning system will be integrated with Russia's, we will get increased detection range for the US ballistic missiles launched from submarines in the South Pacific and Indian Ocean, where we have problems with fast detection.'

Putin also blamed the US for a worsening state of international security.

He said: 'The situation has not gotten any better. It has gotten worse because of the US withdrawal of the INF Treaty, which is obvious to everyone. Now we are waiting for the next decision.'

The Intermediate-Range Nuclear Forces Treaty was an arms control treaty created between the US and the Soviet Union in 1987.

It was created to prevent the US from using government funds to develop missiles prohibited by the treaty.
description: Vladamir Putin confirmed the country will be helping China create the defense system - which only Russia and the US currently have. Details about it and the agreement have not been released.
